name: Paper 1: Reading and Writing - Part 2

name: Paper 1: Reading and Writing - Part 9
questionContents:
Read the note from your friend Richard.
Write a postcard to tell him what he wants to know.
'It's great that you're coming to see me in England. Tell me when you are coming, how long you want to stay and what you want to do.
Write soon!
Richard'
Write 25-35 words.
Write your postcard on the answer sheet.
